title: Mediterranean lamb's liver hotpot
ingredients: ['675g potatoes, peeled and thinly sliced', '1 1/2 tablespoons olive oil', "400g lamb's liver, sliced", '3 rashers pancetta, finely chopped', '2 red onions, finely chopped', '200g sliced button mushrooms', '2 tablespoons plain flour', '3 teaspoons crushed coriander seeds', '450ml lamb or chicken stock, preferably homemade', '1/2 lemon, zested and juiced', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh sage', '3 tablespoons chopped parsley', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh oregano', 'salt and pepper', '30g butter, melted']
